channel.title: Where My Moms At? w/ Christina P.
channel.description: Christina P. is a comedian and exhausted mother of two young boys. WMMA explores all thing parenting - from colossal mom fails to the quiet rage you feel when your toddler won't nap. Emails, voicemails and video submissions are welcome!

image.title: Where My Moms At? w/ Christina P.

channel.itunes:summary: Christina P. is a comedian and exhausted mother of two young boys. WMMA explores all thing parenting - from colossal mom fails to the quiet rage you feel when your toddler won't nap. Emails, voicemails and video submissions are welcome!
channel.itunes:author: YMH Studios
channel.itunes:keywords: moms, family, mother, pazsitzky, parents, mom, wmma, christina p, raising children, where my moms at

item.title: Ep. 168 - Diet Coke And Nicorette w/ Stasia Patwell - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week Christina is joined by fitness goddess and founder of School of Thot, Stasia Patwell. They talk getting back up from rock bottom and taking your fitness journey one step at a time. These mommies are cut from the same cloth as Christina relates to how Stasia models her fitness program: you just have to do "pretty good most of the time".

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com

(213) 375-5184

https://christinaponline.com/tour-dates

https://store.ymhstudios.com/

item.title: Ep. 167 - Never A Full Bush - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

 

On this week’s episode of Where My Moms At, Christina P catches up with the Booth Boys and a couple of your favorite Bears stop by (briefly) to talk about what turns them off. Listeners write in with their deal breakers or “vag-dryers”, as they’re called in Studio Jeans. Birkenstocks, Turkey Trots, and Disney Adults are just a few of the things that make the list. We also get some new Pazsitzky Effects, a What Would Christina P Do question, and a couple philosophy references for a good mix of everything the show has to offer. Plus, the Booth Boys discuss their mom’s “bush” so there’s that. Enjoy!

 

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

 

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com

(213) 375-5184

 

https://christinaponline.com/tour-dates

item.title: Ep. 166 - Why Mommy Drinks - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

 

This week Christina shares she's been running through all the Terminator movies with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Linda Hamilton and how it's all an incredible metaphor for motherhood. We go through some follow ups from listeners on turn offs from potential partners and we review a clip from a husband practicing The Fair Play Method.

 

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

 

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com

(213) 375-5184

item.title: Ep. 165 - What A Dreamboat w/ Nick Simmons - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week we have hardcore mommy and son of Rock N' Roll royalty, Nick Simmons! He talks about being raised by his parents Gene Simmons and Shannon Tweed, having his childhood televised on a reality show, and struggling with living a normal life. Nick talks about the things he learned from his dad and what it's like to experience the last tour that Kiss will ever go on. Nick shares with Christina what his journey to adulthood was like and how funny and Jewish his dad really is.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com
(213) 375-5184

item.title: Ep. 164 - Diarrhea Date - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week’s episode of WMMA, Christina P discusses the hobbies she finds most and least attractive, how she feels about Henry Cavill being a nerd, Louise Hay’s books, sucky dads, her favorite subjects in school, and responds to a listener voicemail with a tip for potty training boys.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 163 - People Are Boring w/ Chase O'Donnell - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Chase O’Donnell joins Christina P this week. They discuss Chase’s dating life, her new special, half birthdays, “Love Island,” “The Bachelor,” and her new series of videos “If Musicals Were Real.” They watch videos of Margot Robbie explaining that she doesn’t feel sexy, and a woman revealing her Pazsitzky Effect: you can get a birthday cake when it’s not your birthday. They react to listener voicemails about the pronunciation of “miniature,” where to blow your nose, moms that listen to the show, and more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 162 - Dial It Back w/ Ryan Sickler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Ryan Sickler joins Christina P for this episode of WMMA. They discuss journaling, EMDR, Ryan’s crazy experience at an Eagles concert, girls’ wardrobe in 2022, kids having crushes, and more! They give advice to listeners about losing your virginity in your 20s and potty training.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 161 - Couch Dads w/ Danny Brown - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Danny Brown joins Christina P for this episode of WMMA. They discuss good dads, Lavar Ball, Adderall, broken McDonald’s ice cream machines, selling drugs, and Danny’s time doing stand-up with Hannibal Buress. Danny also recounts his experience with a teenage miscarriage and raising his daughter today. They respond to voicemail follow ups about the pronunciation of “miniature” and the disposal of “white” socks.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 160 - I'm Being Heckled - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Needing some inspiration this week? Christina has plenty of that for you on this episode with the return of her That's Deep Bro segment. In it, you'll hear her thoughts on being broke at 30, keeping your dreams a secret while you incubate your ideas, and the problem with playing it safe. She also discusses some of the bad advice she's gotten over the years and why she doesn't like giving notes to young comedians. Finally, she reveals how being heckled by someone close to her pushed her to accomplish more. Remember, you don't need anyone's support other than your own, it's okay to be a loser sometimes, and eagles fly alone so be an eagle! Enjoy.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com
(213) 375-5184

https://christinaponline.com/tour-dates
https://store.ymhstudios.com/

item.itunes:title: Ep. 160 - I'm Being Heckled - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.itunes:author: Christina Pazsitzky
item.itunes:summary: Needing some inspiration this week? Christina has plenty of that for you on this episode with the return of her That's Deep Bro segment. In it, you'll hear her thoughts on being broke at 30, keeping your dreams a secret while you incubate your ideas, and the problem with playing it safe. She also discusses some of the bad advice she's gotten over the years and why she doesn't like giving notes to young comedians. Finally, she reveals how being heckled by someone close to her pushed her to accomplish more. Remember, you don't need anyone's support other than your own, it's okay to be a loser sometimes, and eagles fly alone so be an eagle! Enjoy.

item.title: Ep. 159 - Cleaning Up The Garbage w/ Pinky Patel - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Pinky Patel is a mom, comedian, and content creator with over 5 million followers on TikTok. Today, she joins Christina P in her goth room to talk about what it’s like being all of these things. She also explains code switching, her experience with dirty chat rooms, and how she met her husband (did you know Napster had a chat function?). Christina and Pinky bond over getting suspended on TikTok and discuss the problem with the Kardashians while offering up some bits of mom wisdom along the way. Focus with a “P” and enjoy the conversation.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 155 - Luscious Booty - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week Christina talks about how surprising it is that her kids behave in school, embarrassing past email addresses, and funny interactions at the DMV. We take some follow ups about blowing noses, pity trophies and white trash food. And we discuss female Olympic sports, mom hacks, cringe from childhood, and hygiene.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 154 - Fart Hard w/ Jenny Pentland - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina's childhood BFF Jenny Pentland joins Where My Moms At! They talk about her kids growing up, letting your kids bond, and feminism. They talk about Elon Musk, religious dirt bags, and which president is the hottest. And, we go through some Pazsitzky Effects, drugs and body positivity!

item.title: Ep. 153 - Toothless Nannies w/ Jamie Lynn Sigler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

♫Woke up this morning and got yourself some fun♫ On this episode, Christina P welcomes back the wonderful Jamie-Lynn Sigler into the studio. The two talk about motherhood, share nanny horror stories, and discuss the importance of asking for help. They also try to figure out which comedic actors are the most bangable and which Johnny Depp era was the hottest.

Hairy legs, mom hacks, french kissing, and french bread pizza all come up in this well-rounded conversation with the Pajama Pants co-host. And, with love and sincerity, Christina tries to determine if her kids are normal or psychopaths. Enjoy!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 152 - Off The Clock w/ Kati Morton - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Licensed therapist Kati Morton joins us this week! We discuss getting worn down by kids, having a safe space for yourself in your home, and codependency issues. Kati and Christina talk about the differences between men and women, how the definitions for mental health are always changing, and how much better it used to be back in the day.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 148 - Here's A Boat w/ Rob Iler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Rob Iler joins Main Mommy Tina on this episode of WMMA. They discuss Rob’s experience being in Austin for the first time, driving boats with little to no experience, winning Emmys for “The Sopranos,” Asa Akira, dealing with OCD, Christina’s most recent appearance on “The Joe Rogan Experience,” lazy customer service workers and more! They also analyze one of their favorite TikToks from Drag Syndrome.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 147 - It's In The Mind w/ Jenny Pentland - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week’s episode of WMMA, Christina P is joined by childhood friend and author Jenny Pentland. They discuss growing up in the San Fernando Valley, Sports Illustrated’s plus-sized swimsuit model, living in a trailer park, the differences between raising toddlers and teenagers, and more! They respond to follow ups from listeners about bar fruit, adult nannies, and fishing for compliments Jenny and Christina also take a look at their WikiFeet pages and Madonna’s strange TikTok account.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 146 - Lift Rocks Bro - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week’s episode of “Where My Moms At?,” Christina P and the Booth Boys discuss Julia Fox’s “Josh Safdie’s muse” interview, take a look at Bhad Bhabie’s extraordinarily lucrative OnlyFans, and debate whether or not you need a driver’s license. Christina also recaps the Abercrombie and Fitch Netflix documentary, explains her new method for blowing her nose on her clothing, fawns over pictures of Rihanna pregnant, and proposes a YMH staff Olympic event. She also responds to listener submitted “Pazsitzky Effects” and follow ups about favorite “white trash treats.”

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 144 - Mad At Batman - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

SPOILER ALERT! Christina P is back for another episode and is excited to reveal she was able to sneak away from the kids and go hate-watch Batman in the theaters! We hear some follow-ups on participation awards, Wendy's Chili, and dips! We discuss the working girls of the internets, and Christina has a revelation about her mother going to dates at an adult theater. Christina reviews some Mom Hacks, contemplates getting herself an adult nanny, and talks music and life with Sad Chad. We brainstorm a water drinking solution and she figures out how her pajama bottoms are getting soaked!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 143 - Is There One For That? w/Jessica Kirson - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week’s Where My Moms At, Christina P and special guest Jessica Kirson discuss the new YMH Studio in Austin, eating box, Jessica’s father, kindergarten pride parades, not caring anymore, gender roles in relationships, how superheroes have gotten soft, raising sons vs. raising daughters, comedic influences and more! They also respond to listener Pazsitzky Effects.

item.title: Ep. 141 - Oui Oui - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

We finally get to reveal the new set, straight out of Christina's goth bedroom. AND Christina announces her Netflix special comes out on Mom's Day May 8! Christina took her kids to Chicago to visit Tom and now everyone's sick! We talk about relationships, gender roles, and we get an update on Christina's kids not sleeping in their room. We get updates on parades, bath bombs, picture frames, and we get into a divisive unpopular opinion. We share some Pazsitzky Effects about removing makeup, drinking on planes, over eating, stove tops and headphones. Chad talks about an outing with a sophisticated French lady, and we hear more Pazsitzky Effects from the listeners!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 135 - 6,000 Calories - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week's episode of WMMA, Christina P discusses her new favorite show "Inventing Anna," shares her opinion on Charli XCX's music, and rails against unhealthy female celebrity diets. She responds to listener voicemails and emails about rebranding vegetables for kids, having a crush on your professor, alternatives for paint thinner, how not to slip in your bathroom, and why you should blow your nose into your shirt. She also gives advice to a girl whose boyfriend's grandma doesn't like her, and wraps up by sharing her idea for a better massage.

item.title: Ep. 134 - Come Get A Suckle w/Jenny Pentland - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Chris-Jeansa welcomes her childhood friend, and daughter of Roseanne Barr, Jenny Pentland! Check out her new book "This Will Be Funny Later." Jenny talks about what it's like to raise 5 boys, growing up goth with Christina, and what it was like for Jenny dating a rabbi. We get into some followups about hot republicans, adult breastfeeding, and also some revolutionary Pazsitzky Effeccts!

item.title: Ep. 133 - Is Your Mom Hot? - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Moms, Mommies, and everybody in between, welcome to another episode of Where My Mom’s At? With Christina P! This week Christina starts off singing songs with Enny. Did you know he’s coming out with an R&B album soon? Until then, let’s get back to solving today’s world issues. “How DO you say crayon?”, “How do I refill my water less stupidly?”, and “What’s a good way to get rid of fire ants?”. More Pazsitzky Effects. More Mom Hacks. More fetish talk! This time we get a follow up on the preoccupation for lactating lovers. Anybody got a weird fetish they want to expose Christina to? Leave us a voicemail! Then, Mommy P tests the booth boys on their US History. Booth Boys 2024?? Thanks for watching and join us again next week for more mom stuff!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 132 - Not Today Jesus w/Kati Morton - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

AYO MOMS, WHERE YOU AT??? It's another episode of Where My Moms At, this time with one of our favorite therapists, Kati Morton! Christie and Kati start the conversation off talking about the struggle of balancing being a mother and having a career (and life!), the luxury of living alone, and... the queen of England? That's right, Ms. Pants and Kati indulge in their shared affinity for English culture and current events. Kati gives her professional take on eating disorders, and social media commenters, "Jack the old Texan" gives his professional take on "crayon", and a listener champions Christina's fun new nose blowing technique. Then some classic Pazsitzky Effects?? You don't wanna miss this episode!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 131 - Cut The Cord - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina gets ready for the big winter storm hitting Texas, she shows a cool new service offered by a manicurist to do your baby's nails, and we review a riveting Vice article about a cool new breastfeeding trend in India! Christina reveals a Pazsitzky Effect that she can take classes in things she's interested in learning, like painting... who would have thunk it?! Rob Iler tells Christina about Alpha Con and she is AMPED for it! We get into some mom hacks about post cards, using your kids to ask questions, and drying your clothes. We get into some Pazsitzky Effects about updating contacts in your phone, turning lights on when you can't see, and throwing away things you don't like. We try to problem solve messy bath time, doggy doors, and bad water bottles. We get into the magic of child birth and wrap up with an amazing song we got made about Enny.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
item.author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
item.content:encoded:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina gets ready for the big winter storm hitting Texas, she shows a cool new service offered by a manicurist to do your baby's nails, and we review a riveting Vice article about a cool new breastfeeding trend in India! Christina reveals a Pazsitzky Effect that she can take classes in things she's interested in learning, like painting... who would have thunk it?! Rob Iler tells Christina about Alpha Con and she is AMPED for it! We get into some mom hacks about post cards, using your kids to ask questions, and drying your clothes. We get into some Pazsitzky Effects about updating contacts in your phone, turning lights on when you can't see, and throwing away things you don't like. We try to problem solve messy bath time, doggy doors, and bad water bottles. We get into the magic of child birth and wrap up with an amazing song we got made about Enny.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 130 - Pie In Your Face- Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina P tries to read through some of your "Gross Things You shouldn't Like" and immediately regrets it. Y'all nasty as hell! Then, we have an incredible call with the pie guy and it turns out a lot more wholesome than you'd expect! We do some followups on queso, 711's menu and we get into a debate about the pronunciation of the word "crayon." Nadav starts spiraling in the middle of the episode and realizes he may need to get back into therapy.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 129 - Keep It Open - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina gives us an update on all the ridiculously inclusive dolls that Barbie is putting out, and some follow ups on tuna related nick names and losing virginities. We take a look at how other countries do their Mac and Cheese/Kraft Dinners. We handle some WWCPD's about staying faithful to your significant other, having a kid during these wild times and marital loves during pregnancy. We read a mom hack about how useful an egg timer can be when wrangling your kids and how to sneak veggies into your kids' diets. We get into some Pazsitzky Effects and the crew reveals gross things they secretly love. What's your secret?

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 128 - Punk Nerds - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina comes in today all fired up about her Starbucks barista wearing a Star Trek pin on their apron. Are Star Trek nerds different from punk nerds? We get into follow ups about ho bags, boyfriends liking stuff on Instagram, and an update from Jack the Texan! Christina gives some insight on how she teaches her kids what's bad to do and we talk about tiers of groups in high school. We also do our best to answer some WWCPD's about bringing ladies back to your parents house, dealing with a cheating partner, and a cool pie kink.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 127 - Welcome Back - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WARNING: Spoilers for the new Spiderman movie and Sex And The City reboot in this episode!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Chris-jeansa is SO happy to be back from the holidays and reunited with you! We catch up with some of the things Christina hated most from the break: watching Spirman: No Way Home and the Sex And The City reboot "And Just Like That." We hear about Enny's New Years and some tips on DM-ing. We get into some follow-ups, talk about how snacks are stupid, and hear a juicy mom confession. We try to give some advice to a woman disliking her boyfriend looking at ladies on the internet, marital loves and gassiness during pregnancy. We hear some Pazsitzky effects about lube, PO boxes, buying Kleenex, and using AC in the car.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Hey mommies! It's another week of Where My Mom's At! This week, comedian Chase O'Donnell makes another return appearance! She starts the episode by sharing what it's like to tour with Christina, and recaps times where Mommy P intentionally embarrassed her. They then discuss their social lives growing up, from Chase's "Disney Channel" innocence, to Christina's goth vibes. They involve the booth, and discuss what age they all lost their v cards, including a heavy story from Danny, the newest booth boy. Lastly, Chase brings her most recent "Millennial Powerpoint", a presentation intended to keep boomer moms and dads up to speed with all the new trends!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 125 - No Red Flags - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://solostove.com and use promo code WMMA to get $10 off plus a lifetime warranty and FREE 30-day returns. - Go to https://OVERLAND.com/WMMA to get the best, highest-quality sheepskin slippers on the market PLUS free shipping and free returns. - Go to https://talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month with the promo code WMMA. - Register for an account at https://Stance.com and get 15% off your first purchase. - Visit https://ETTITUDE.com/wmma and enter promo code wmma to get 20% off your order, plus free shipping. - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA to get a great deal on a Ring Alarm security kit today! - Go to https://THEPILLCLUB.COM/WMMA to get your first birth control care package and donate to help more women in need of affordable birth control. - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code WHERE to get $10 off your purchase. - Go to https://ShipStation.com, click on the microphone at the top, and enter code WMMA to get a 60-day free trial.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina is at her wits' end trying to figure out the gender of an employee she likes at the store she frequents. What's the best way for her to be respectful about it? We discuss the difficulties of getting to places on time and how charming Peter Dinklage is. We listen to some voicemail follow ups on cleaning shoes and puke bowls. We go over a couple of listener submitted Pazsitzky Effects about changing shower heads, getting new pillows, and general tips on undergarments and stained mattresses. Christina pitches some red flags to the booth boys: would you rather a lady with long sharp claw nails of a lady REALLY into horoscopes. Christina wonders if Enny will ever teach a dating class and we get into VH1's "The Pick Up Artist." Christina answers some listeners' "What Would Christina P Do" about dating with an age gap and keeping unsolicited advice at bay.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 124 - TikTok Crybaby - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to https://DipseaStories.com/WMMA - Get 20% off any new subscription with promo code WMMA at https://littlepassports.com. - Go to https://AdamandEve.com and enter offer code WMMA at checkout to get 50% off almost any one item and 10 tantalizing FREE gifts! - Save fifteen dollars off your first visit at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA when you use our code: WMMA. - Get 25% off when you go to http://LIQUIDIV.COM and use code WMMA at checkout. Go to https://StoryWorth.com/wmma and save $10 on your first purchase! - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code WHERE to get $10 off your purchase. - Go to https://BreezeAirbrush.com/WMMA to receive 50% OFF your airbrush makeup system PLUS free shipping! - Download Switchcraft for free and unlock the magical mystery! - Head to https://FahertyBrand.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get 20% off your first purchase.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Mommy ChrisJeansa starts off with reviewing the House of Gucci movie and complaining about Adam Driver's sex appeal and how he should stick to Lena Dunham. Christina shares her community guideline violations on TikTok and she is UPSET; why can't the cry babies on TikTok just chill and be cool with craziness? Christina talks about Dave Chappelle's recent visit to his old high school and how refreshing his perspective is about people's opinions. We then take a tangent and discuss 4chan, Anonymous, crypto currency, and bank robbing. We get an update on Christina's kids, talk about working in the service industry, and listen to some follow up voicemails about bread bags and ice trays. We get some Pazsitzky Effects about buying yourself cake and take a look at holiday treats that are mostly terrible.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 123 - The Return of Chris - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://solostove.com and get $10 off with promo code WMMA. Plus, a lifetime warranty and FREE 30-day returns! - Get $200 off when you go to https://saatva.com/theshit.  - Save fifteen dollars off your first visit at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA when you use our code: WMMA. - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code WHERE to get $10 off your purchase. - Go to https://MANLYBANDS.com/wmma or use promo code wmma to get 25% off now through Cyber Monday! - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA to get a great deal on a Ring Alarm security kit today! - Go to https://THEPILLCLUB.COM/WMMA to get your first birth control care package and donate to help more women in need of affordable birth control. - Use code WMMA at https://pendulumlife.com to get 20% off all products! - Go to https://PeacockTV.com to sign up and stream your reality favorites today!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week of Where My Moms At, we celebrate reaching 100k subscribers and get into Christina's rewatching of Sex And The City and the beef between Sarah Jessica Parker and Kim Cattrall. Nadav shares he's been watching the Wu Tank Clan show on Hulu and rewatching some old Nardwuar interviews. Christina shares how her youngest is changing his name every week, which is training her to be better with the whole pronoun thing. Christina and the #BoothBoys then talk about getting into fights at school along with the do's and don'ts of fight etiquette. We then welcome Sweet Chris Larson to the city of Austin! We learn about his track record and Christina pitches Chris on a sex-filled vacation... will he say yes? We do some follow-ups on AJ Soprano, gender neutral toys, and ice trays.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 122 - Sudafed Chronicles Part 2 (Trap Remix) - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Get 20% off any new subscription with promo code WMMA at https://littlepassports.com. - Go to https://Stance.com and enjoy the color and comfort of a life less ordinary. - Look for Zelle® in your banking app today to send money to family and friends no matter where they bank in the U.S. - Go to https://talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month with the promo code WMMA. - Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code WMMA at https://Manscaped.com. - Download Switchcraft for free and unlock the magical mystery! - Stream more of your reality favorites on Peacock. Go to https://PeacockTV.com to sign up. - Visit https://ETTITUDE.com/wmma and enter promo code wmma to get 20% off your order, plus free shipping! - Go to https://AdamandEve.com and enter offer code WMMA at checkout to get 50% off almost any one item and 10 tantalizing FREE gifts! - Go to https://ShipStation.com, click on the microphone at the top, and enter code WMMA to get a 60-day free trial!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Part 2 of the Sudafed Chronicles - the trap remix! Picking up where she left off last week, Christina P gets into all sorts of Pazsitzky Effects, voicemails, and emails on this week’s #WMMA. We talk getting older and dressing quirkier, realizing you can wear whatever color winter coat that you want, separating yourself from the pack, and how "Trap Remix" might be the best name for a stuffed iguana. A voicemail from a husband who makes scented spa towels for his wife at home leaves Christine upset at Tom. A caller’s tip to use gap blockers to keep toys out from under the couch falls on deaf ears. And a husband who “forgets to brush his teeth” leads to a conversation on hygiene, being the smelly kid growing up, and knowing that Peppermint Patty was a lesbian. Then, Christina shares a vital Mom Hack for when you need a Mom Break called the Cost-Benefit Analysis. We talk about what happened when Christina let her boys play with a cheap first aid kit and how she instills honesty with rewards. Enny puts an end to the watermelon seed debate and has a troubling revelation about his mom along the way. What’s the right way to store bread? Can you wash gym shoes? Does Nadav HAVE to finish all the food on his plate? We have answers. Also, we tackle your WWCPD questions on fixing credit reports, gentle parenting TikToks, and something called a “puke bowl.” This week we also get into celebrity before and after pictures, Liberace, and finding out Miles Davis was gay. Cool moms like jazz!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing. Part 2 of the Sudafed Chronicles - the trap remix! Picking up where she left off last week, Christina P gets into all sorts of Pazsitzky Effects, voicemails, and emails on this week’s #WMMA. We talk getting older and dressing quirkier, realizing you can wear whatever color winter coat that you want, separating yourself from the pack, and how "Trap Remix" might be the best name for a stuffed iguana. A voicemail from a husband who makes scented spa towels for his wife at home leaves Christine upset at Tom. A caller’s tip to use gap blockers to keep toys out from under the couch falls on deaf ears. And a husband who “forgets to brush his teeth” leads to a conversation on hygiene, being the smelly kid growing up, and knowing that Peppermint Patty was a lesbian. Then, Christina shares a vital Mom Hack for when you need a Mom Break called the Cost-Benefit Analysis. We talk about what happened when Christina let her boys play with a cheap first aid kit and how she instills honesty with rewards. Enny puts an end to the watermelon seed debate and has a troubling revelation about his mom along the way. What’s the right way to store bread? Can you wash gym shoes? Does Nadav HAVE to finish all the food on his plate? We have answers. Also, we tackle your WWCPD questions on fixing credit reports, gentle parenting TikToks, and something called a “puke bowl.” This week we also get into celebrity before and after pictures, Liberace, and finding out Miles Davis was gay. Cool moms like jazz! Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. item.title: Ep. 121 - Sudafed Chronicles Part 1 - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA at sign up to get your first visit for only $5 - To get an additional pair of gloves for free all November, go to https://JoinFightCamp.com/MOMS  - Get the best, highest-quality sheepskin slippers on the market at https://OVERLAND.com/WMMA  - Go to https://WMMA.MYFITNESSPAL.com and use code WMMA to get a one-month premium membership for FREE - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA to get a great deal on a Ring Alarm security kit today - Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to https://DipseaStories.com/WMMA 

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week’s episode of Where My Moms At? is brought to you by prescription-strength Sudafed! After taking last week off to recover from a cold, Christina P is back with the Booth Boys on the day of her anniversary with Todd. She breaks down how she crushed Halloween this year as Cruella, including full-size candy bars! Christina shares her experience of trunk-or-treating for the first time, and how she's going to completely destroy next years competition. Christina shares some sage advice about letting your kids eating candy, store-bought dental guards, how to remove ice from an ice tray the right way, and growing up and learning to J your D. We break down November’s Instagram post from our very own Chris Larson and dive into a TikTok about Gender Creative Parenting. What gender did your baby chose to be today? Also, Christina answers all your questions on how to get your kids to bed on time, how to get them to sleep in their own beds, and when is the right time to make daddy a Hall Monitor. This Sudafed got us so keyed up, we're just going long and breaking this recording into 2 episodes... see you next week for Part 2! Not like a regular mom!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 120 - So Dumb - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Get almost any one item for 50% off, and get 10 tantalizing FREE gifts when you use offer code WMMA at checkout at https://AdamAndEve.com. -Get $15 off your first month's subscription at https://Nutrafol.com with code WMMA, plus FREE shipping on EVERY order. - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA for a special offer on a Ring Alarm Security kit today. - Download Switchcraft for free and unlock the magical mystery!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week on #WMMA Christina P brings up the hot new California mandated law: toy stores must have a gender neutral toy section! Christina also updates us on a recent outing with a group of #CoolMoms she found. We talk about group chat culture, Christina unveils her favorite new tongue-themed TikTok, and a really cool movie called "False Advertising." We talk about the subject of race and children, gushers and fruit leather, and being left alone growing up. We get into some good ol' fashioned self loathing, the new season of "You" on Netflix, and some advice for parents who are expecting! Nadav then reveals a new Pazsitzky effect which evolves into a really neat ice cube tutorial. We share your Pazsitzky Effects about avocados and 2nd coffees! Christina shares some posts from her Next Door app and turns out there are snakes in bath tubs out here! Christina also shares how her kids put food on her at lunch time. Stay cool, moms!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Today, Kati Morton joins Christina P on Where My Moms At?! They talk about some good parenting techniques to gently correct bad behavior from children, as well as some tips on interacting with narcissistic parents. Christina shows how wild some of Madonna's recent antics are, and we see what Kati has to say about the whole Britney Spears situation. We talk a little about Love On The Spectrum and get into some TikToks!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing. It's Mommy Tina and the Booth Boys once again for this episode of Where My Moms At. Christina talks about riding her Sea-Doo, her favorite period pieces, teenage hangout spots, and playing with fire. She responds to listener voicemails and emails about solutions to her bunk bed problem, nicknames for private parts, preparing to have a second child, and how to spell "Aiyaiyai!." She wraps up with a round of "Pazsitzky Effects." Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 117 - Cool Dad Moves - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Get $200 off your order at https://saatva.com/theshit. - Save $15 off your first visit with an Apostrophe provider at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA when you use our code: WMMA. - Get almost any one item for 50% off, and get 10 tantalizing FREE gifts when you use offer code WMMA at checkout at https://AdamAndEve.com. - Get the best, highest-quality sheepskin slippers on the market at https://OVERLAND.com/WMMA. - Go to https://WMMA.MYFITNESSPAL.com and use code WMMA to get a one-month premium membership for FREE! - Visit https://pendulumlife.com and use promo code WMMA for 20% off your first bottle of membership.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week's WMMA is out of YMH's new temp studio in YMH staffer Enny's house. Christina discusses joining a book club, Jada and Will Smith's non-monogamous relationship, white people smell, and having Thanksgiving food year-round. Christina also debates whether or not to reach out to her estranged father who she hasn't spoken to in many years. She wraps up by responding to some listener-submitted "Pazsitzky Effects."

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 116 Damage Control - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - If you support companies that believe in doing good, try Vital Farms at https://vitalfarms.com. - Get 20% off your first order by visiting https://foriawellness.com/wmma OR use code WMMA at checkout. - Get free shipping on your first order from https://Nuts.com when you text MOMS to 64-000 - Download the Caviar App and use offer code WMMA for $10 off an order of $20 or more.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P and the Booth Boys discuss potential Halloween costumes, Chase O'Donnell's Instagram dance videos, La-Z boy recliners, the Austin aquarium, and bra shopping. They also share their wildest stories from being dog owners. Christina talks about her decision to cut off her kids from YouTube and iPads, and responds to some listener #MomHacks about balloons, vacuum cleaners, and panties. They wrap up by discussing a "What Would Christina P Do" question about getting body modification against your spouse's wishes.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 115 Talk Less - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit to get $200 off your next order - Go to https://AdamandEve.com and use code WMMA at checkout for almost any one item for 50% off and 10 tantalizing FREE gifts! - Save $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA when you use our code: WMMA. - Download the Caviar App and use offer code WMMA for $10 off an order of $20 or more. - Go to https://Talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month with the promo code WMMA. - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA for a special offer on a Ring Alarm Security kit today. - If you support companies that believe in doing good, try Vital Farms at https://vitalfarms.com. - Get free shipping on your first order from https://Nuts.com when you text MOMS to 64-000

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina and the Booth Boys discuss Jewish holidays, sending nudes, why Hobby Lobby doesn't sell Halloween decorations, "Sex and the City," "Cobra Kai" actor Tanner Buchanan, teen movies, and roller skating. They also pose the question: Would you rather date someone who is super Christian or super woke? CP responds to listener emails about kids who grew up in bars, Lisa Bonet and her family, parenting becoming enjoyable, and nicknames for body parts. She also responds to Pazsitzky Effects, and shares a recent one she had.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 114 Love Yourself - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go https://magicspoon.com/WMMA and use promo code WMMA at checkout to save $5 off your order - Get 20% off your first order by visiting https://www.foriawellness.com/wmma OR use code WMMA at checkout. - Go to https://oliveandjune.com/WMMA and use code WMMA to get 20% off your first Mani System - Go to https://BABBEL.com and use promo code WMMA for an extra 3 months free. - Go to https://Brooklinen.com and use promo code WMMA to get $20 off, with a minimum purchase of $100. - If you support companies that believe in doing good, try Vital Farms at https://vitalfarms.com. - Get 25% off when you go to https://LIQUIDIV.COM and use code WMMA at checkout. - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA for a special offer on a Ring Alarm Security kit today.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week's WMMA, Christina talks about her husband Tom Segura acting like a "dad" when they're in the car, it/its pronouns that are now being used, past androgynous celebrities, Louise Hay's mirror work, Christina's love of Austin, Texas, and more! She responds to listener voicemails and emails about Amazon wish lists, getting kids to do chores, the plus-sized Bon Apetit article, and a couple who says they conceived their child after seeing Christina's show.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213) 375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week's WMMA, Christina talks to Nadav about the extravagant meal he had at Hollywood landmark Musso & Frank Grill. This naturally leads into a conversation about competitive eating, which Christina and the Booth Boys are all big fans of. Mommy Tina and the Booth Mommies also discuss what makes Chris Larson happy, sunny delight, Swiss army knives, the studio cleaners' reactions to Tina's YMH Live "prosthetics," and revisit their soap vs. body wash debate. They also respond to listener voicemails and emails about night sweats, hating white, skater kids, and car squeegees. They wrap up by reviewing this week's Pazsitzky Effect submissions, and responding to a Mom Hack about cleaning phone screens.

Just visit https://toodaloo.com/WMMA. - Head over to https://chilisleep.com/WMMA to take advantage of our exclusive discount and wake up refreshed, everyday! - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA for a special offer on a Ring Alarm Security kit today.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, we're getting ready to go back to school and everybody hates it! We hear some stories about Christina's childhood when her dad would take her to bars. We also have A'Shon in the booth and we get into the roommate dynamic between him and Enny! How close are you with YOUR roommates? We get into unfairly hot couples and give some of the best financial advice WE'VE ever given!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit to get $200 off your next order - Go to https://AdamandEve.com and use code WMMA at checkout for almost any one item for 50% off and 10 tantalizing FREE gifts! - Go to https://Cuyana.com/WMMA and receive 10% off your first order over $150 plus free shipping. - Go to https://FahertyBrand.com and enter code WMMA at checkout to snag 20% off ALL your summer gear! - Go to https://Brooklinen.com and use promo code WMMA and shop the Labor Day Savings Event this coming weekend! - Go to https://Talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month with the promo code WMMA. - Go to https://Ring.com/WMMA for a special offer on a Ring Alarm Security kit today.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P is joined by author, YouTuber, and licensed marriage family therapist Kati Morton in this episode of WMMA. They discuss living in Austin, Texas, where they both recently moved, how trauma is defined, the ideas behind the book "The Body Keeps A Score," ways to comfort yourself, how to understand PTSD, healthy relationship development, why Christina was traumatized by leafblowers growing up, the hard work that comes with being in therapy, and why "boring is better" when it comes to dating.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina starts off this episode of WMMA by discussing getting her oldest son, Ellis, a skateboard. She also talks riding her new Sea-Doo, running into an also-injured Conor McGregor, her experience being platinum blonde, fat models, and what makes the Booth Boys angry. She responds to listener emails and voicemails about robotic mops, cleaning hands with Clorox wipes, baby weight, dads sleeping through babies crying, kids in Japan, and ways to lessen the grossness of eating scrum.

She also talks riding her new Sea-Doo, running into an also-injured Conor McGregor, her experience being platinum blonde, fat models, and what makes the Booth Boys angry. She responds to listener emails and voicemails about robotic mops, cleaning hands with Clorox wipes, baby weight, dads sleeping through babies crying, kids in Japan, and ways to lessen the grossness of eating scrum. Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213) 375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 108 Antisocial Champ w/ Rob Iler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Save $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA - Go to https://BABBEL.com and use promo code WMMA for an extra 3 months free. - Try Olive & June's Mani System at https://oliveandjune.com/ - Go to https://Brooklinen.com and use promo code WMMA to get $20 off, with a minimum purchase of $100. - Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code CHRISTINA. - Get 20% off your first order when you use promo code Mom at https://TRYCALIPER.COM/Mom.

Today on Where My Mom's At?, Sopranos star and co-host of the Pajama Pants podcast, Rob Iler stops by. First, they talk about racist family members, the differences between LA and Austin then answer some voicemails. Next, Christina and Rob share a list of things they both hate, give their opinion on Sbarro pizza and Chipotle and Rob shows a video of him eating dinner. After that, they go over a couple Pazsitzky effects, Rob gets a call from Kassem and then discuss Rob's dating life.

item.title: Ep. 107 Vertebrae Snapping w/ Scott Pfaff - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Visit https://HookedOnPhonics.com/WMMA,  and receive your first month for just $1 - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial! - Go to https://FahertyBrand.com and enter code WMMA at checkout to snag 20% off ALL your summer gear! - Get 50% off your first month of a Helium 10 Platinum account when you go to https://Helium10.com/WMMA. - Go https://magicspoon.com/WMMA and use promo code WMMA at checkout to save $5 off your order - Get 25% off when you go to http://LIQUIDIV.COM/ and use code WMMA at checkout.

DESCRIPTION: Today on Where My Mom's At?, Christina is joined by skateboarder Scott "Big Cat" Pfaff from the MTV show, Fantasy Factory. First, CP talks about the boys moving to Austin, the best time to have kids and gives an update on her ankle injury. Then, Christina and the booth boys discuss the difference between shower gel and body wash, how white people smell and new baby gate ideas. Next, Scott joins in and talks about how he got the name "Big Cat", riding on a scoot-scoot and moving out to LA to become a pro skater. After that, Scott tells Christina about getting into skateboarding, learning new tricks and shows some old videos including him riding a rhinoceros and getting injured for the first time.

item.title: Ep. 106 Share Your Truth - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit to get $200 off your next order - Go to https://ShadyRays.com and use Code: MOMS for 50% off 2 or more pairs - Buy One, Get One Free. - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA. - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code CHRISTINA to get $10 off your purchase - Go to https://HarperWilde.com/WMMA today so you can get 20% off your first purchase - For a limited time get 15% off your pair of Ultimate Ears FITS True Wireless Earbuds at https://ue.com/fits when you use promo code WMMA at checkout. - Go to https://Cuyana.com/WMMA and receive 10% off your first order over $150 plus free shipping. - Visit https://GoHenry.com and get one free month with promo code WMMA.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Today on Where My Mom's At?, Christina gives us an update on her ankle injury as well as her eye surgery procedure. Then, Chris talks about posting on Instagram for the first time as Christina and Zollo encourage more from Chris on social media. Next, Christina talks about Hilary Duff's latest pregnancy pictures, Jada Pinkett Smith's new hijab and Michael Jackson's daughter, Paris. After that, Christina and the booth boys talk about astrology, Brittney Spears' conservatorship and vision boards. Last, Christina responds to voicemails and emails regarding peeing the bed, flossing teeth and clothes hangers.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina discusses how she decorated her scoot scoot, potential options for keeping her little one is his room, suggestive Doublemint Gum commercials, Halston's glasses, Jada Pinkett Smith's "Red Table Talk," and Bhad Bhabie. She responds to listener emails and voicemails about flavored lubes, hairy armpits, bikini trimmers, waist trainers, cutting hair ties, smelly trash, tupperware, and more! Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina P discusses the West Palm Beach YMH Live Show, Florida style, adjusting to life in Austin, Texas, and moving with kids. She also follows up on two very divisive issues: shaving pubic hair, and eating scrum. She calls YMH regular, former Sopranos actor Robert Iler to have him weigh in.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184

item.title: Ep. 99 I Like It All w/ Dr. Debra Soh - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA. - Get 20% Off + Free Shipping, with the code WMMA at https://Manscaped.com - Visit https://HookedOnPhonics.com/WMMA, and receive your first month for just $1. - Go to https://MunkPack.com enter the code WMMA at checkout to save 20% your purchase - Get Honey for FREE at https://JoinHoney.com/WMMA.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Dr. Debra Soh joins Christina P to discuss what she's spent her career researching: gender! Christina was fascinated with Dr. Soh's book "The End of Gender," and wanted to get into the details around gender and sexuality. We get into dysmorphia, hormones, social norms and so much more! Check out Dr. Soh's book on Amazon and her new podcast "The Dr. Debra Soh Podcast!"

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184

item.title: Ep. 98 Borderline w/ Ryan Sickler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit to get $200 off your next order - Go to https://ShadyRays.com and use Code: MOMS for 50% off 2 or more pairs - Buy One, Get One Free. - Go to https://GetSunday.com/WMMA for $20 off your custom lawn plan! - Go to https://HarperWilde.com/wmma today so you can get 20% off your first purchase - Go to https://AzunaFresh.com today and use promo code WMMA for 20% off your new favorite odor eliminator - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial! - Get 10% off your first 3 months at https://Ritual.com/WMMA - For a limited time get 15% off your pair of UE FITS True Wireless Earbuds at https://ue.com/fits when you use promo code WMMA at checkout.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this week's episode, Christina is joined by comedian and host of "The HoneyDew" podcast Ryan Sickler. Ryan and Christina discuss generational trauma, borderline personality disorder, food fights in school, Demi Lovato's frozen yogurt controversy, and Ryan's webseries with Tom Segura, "Cutman." Ryan also discusses the four times he's had to administer CPR, three of which were lifesaving. As always they respond to listener follow-ups and Pazsitzky Effects.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184

item.title: Ep. 97 Timing Is Everything - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA. - Go to https://juneshine.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to claim 20% off and free shipping site wide - Head to https://Ancestry.com/WMMA to get your Ancestry DNA kit and start your free trial today! - Go to https://cbdMD.com and enter code YOURMOM for 25% off your next order

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina and Nadav go over some of the phases they've gone through, like the period in your life when you made your bed every day, your cooking phase, your mid life crisis phase. We're all going through phases all the time, which one are you in now? We also get to meet Ashaun! We get into mouth kissing your parents, some juicy mom confessions, and some new baby questions!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 96 Don't Think About It w/ Chase O'Donnell - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 20% off the new Breathless toy or up to 50% off almost any other one item plus free shipping! - Go https://magicspoon.com/WMMA and use promo code WMMA at checkout to save $5 off your order - Try 5 pairs of glasses at home for free at https://WarbyParker.com/wmma. - Go to https://AzunaFresh.com today and use promo code WMMA for 20% off your new favorite odor eliminator

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Christina brings on one of her favorite millennial comedians, Chase O'Donnell! We find out what the kids are into these days as well as what they were into back in the day! We compare the cute boys of Cobra Kai to the cute boys of Zach and Cody's Suite Life! We discuss shaving, learning to drink, and face tattoos. The ladies review some Pazsitzky Effects, Mom Fails, and weigh in on some questions from moms! Then Chase and Christina spiral into looking up Brad Pitt's Play Girl photos as well as other celebrities.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184

We discuss shaving, learning to drink, and face tattoos. The ladies review some Pazsitzky Effects, Mom Fails, and weigh in on some questions from moms! Then Chase and Christina spiral into looking up Brad Pitt's Play Girl photos as well as other celebrities. Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can. WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com (213) 375-5184
