item.title: Ep. 94 Who Needs Plates? w/ Rob Iler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit to get $200 off your next order - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Go to https://juneshine.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to claim 20% off and free shipping site wide - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code CHRISTINA to get $10 off your purchase. - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial! - Go to https://GetSunday.com/WMMA for $20 off your custom lawn plan! - Head to https://Ancestry.com/WMMA to start your free trial today!

On today's Where My Mom's At?, Rob Iler from the Sopranos stops by to chat with Christina. First, Rob talks about his podcast with Kassem G. and Jamie-Lynn Sigler called Pajama Pants. Next, Rob reveals he's got a date after the show and discloses to Christina that he has some habits he needs to stop before having a girlfriend. Next, Rob talks about growing up a child actor, getting a job on the Sopranos at age 12 and the relationships he made on the show. Then, Rob goes in depth on his party lifestyle when he was younger and how he knew it was time to stop after a birthday party at Madison Square Garden. After that, Christina and Rob go through some Pazsitzky effects including washing your shower curtain, using a toilet brush and Rob announces his own Pazsitzky effect that everyone should hear.

item.title: Ep. 93 Mommy Doctor w/ Dr. Jessica Hochman - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://RebateKey.com and check out everything they offer rebates on, sign up for free! - Go to https://BrightCellars.com/WMMA to get your wine matches, and receive 50% off your first 6 bottle order. - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and enter code WMMA for 50% off one item and 10 free gifts! - Go to https://StoryWorth.com/WMMA to get $10 off your first purchase! - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code CHRISTINA to get $10 off your purchase.

Today on Where My Mom's At?, local pediatrician Dr. Jessica Hochman joins Christina to talk about some helpful tips for parents. First, Jessica describes how vacations have become more pleasant now that the kids are getting older. Then, Jessica reveals some insight on child safety including choking, drowning and behavior around cars. Next, Christina and Jessica answer emails involving everything from child vaccination and co-sleeping to genital cleaning and boogers. Last, Jessica uncovers some secrets to get kids to eat healthy and how to listen to your child.

item.title: Ep. 92 Take It Down A Notch w/ Alexandra Pfeifer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code WMMA. - Go https://magicspoon.com/WMMA and use promo code WMMA at checkout to save $5 off your order - Check out Higher Ground's new podcast "Renegades: Born in the USA" for free only on Spotify - Go to https://juneshine.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to claim 20% off and free shipping site wide

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina invites one of her favorite boss moms from the neighborhood onto the show, Alexandra Pfeifer! Alexandra is a native Angelino and current real estate agent. She talks about growing up in LA and how out of control some of the kids she grew up with were. Her and Christina then gossip about some of their neighbors and discuss how/why Alexandra got adult braces. We discuss early music careers, Cobra Kai, and so much more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Hack," "Pazsitzky Effect," or anything else from the mom world please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. item.title: Ep. 84 Super Powers - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://AdamAndEve.com and use the offer code WMMA to get 50% off just about any item plus 10 FREE Gifts! - Go to https://cbdMD.com and enter code YOURMOM for 25% off your next order - Go to https://MagicSpoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get $5 off. - Visit https://LemonaidHealth.com/WMMA to get your first month of anxiety or depression treatment for only $5. - Go to http://DrinkBev.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to receive 20% off your first purchase & FREE shipping.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's Christina P and the booth boys on this episode and we have all sorts of fun! Christina keeps talking about her new obsession "The Apology Line" and how it's getting her to like a lot of the crime/murder stuff Tom Segura likes? We discover Christina's actual super powers: extracting deep and dark secrets out of people. She's REALLY good at it! And with that, we start reading some "Mom Confessions" submitted by our mommy listeners and they are JUICY. We get into how kids interact during lunch, and Christina gets disgusted after discovering Nadav does cool stuff with girls sometimes.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Hack," "Pazsitzky Effect," or anything else from the mom world please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's just the main mommy for this episode. Christina discusses selling clothes online, Uber ratings, husband maintenance, and state capitols. She responds to listener follow-ups about mikvahs, bordeline personality parents, diversity in Barbies, and naming babies. She also reviews #MomHacks and #PazsitzkyEffects.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://Vuori.com/MOM and get 20% off your first purchase plus free shipping on U.S. orders over $75 - Get $15 off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at https://Apostrophe.com/WMMA and use our code: WMMA. - Go to https://DrinkBev.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to receive 20% off your first purchase & FREE shipping. - Go to https://MagicSpoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get free shipping. - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Ryan Sickler is a comedian and the host of The HoneyDew podcast. He joins Christina P to discuss his experience having COVID-19, homeschooling his daughter during quarantine, flaws in the education system, getting on Lexapro, and the differences between mom and dad.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Pazsitzky Effect" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 81 True Blue Moms - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://Saatva.com/theshit to save $225 on your order - Go to https://cbdMD.com and enter code YOURMOM for 25% off your next order - Go to https://MagicSpoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA for $5 off your order - Go to https://HelloFresh.com/10wmma and use code 10wmma to get 10 free meals including free shipping! - Visit https://LemonaidHealth.com/WMMA to get your first month of anxiety or depression treatment for only $5.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P starts off this episode of WMMA by discussing the current Covid situation in Los Angeles, her early ideas for stage names, the upcoming move to Austin, Texas, and crazy elementary school moms. She reacts to listener follow-ups regarding peanut allergy immunity, buying moving boxes, media mail shipping, naming kids and hoarding old deodorants. She gives listener advice about a guy who won't sleep in a bed with a woman on her period and a young daughter stating she's bisexual. CP also reviews a McDonald's #MomHack.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

This week, Bert Kreischer joins Christina to give the other half of some of the stories LeeAnn told last week, and one thing is certain, he's responsible for some really creative parenting techniques! No one has worked as hard as Bert to make sure their kids still think Santa Claus exists! We get into some of his hygiene habits, what to consider when picking colleges with his daughter, and how incredibly healthy he is!

item.title: Ep. 78 Good Adjacent w/ LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Everyone's favorite varsity mom, LeeAnn Kreischer, is back! In this episode of Where My Moms At, Christina and LeeAnn talk about the similar dynamics in each other's relationship. Turns out both Christina and Bert like lying to their kids. They also discuss LeeAnn's renewed passion to write her memoir, how we should just let kids be kids, what fighting with Bert is like, and the new tricks LeeAnn taught Christina for giving the best mouth kisses. Plus, did you know Santa is Jesus's brother?

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Kati Morton is a licensed marriage and family therapist, YouTuber, and author. She joins Christina P for this episode of Where My Moms At to offer advice to listeners regarding overweight kids, a child that is afraid of his relatives, a teen who saw her parents XXX pics, how to propose in the midst of a parent's divorce, crazy moms, and more. Christina and Kati also respond to an article about a mom who has continued to breastfeed her child well in to puberty.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Kati Morton is a licensed marriage and family therapist, YouTuber, and author. She joins Christina P for this episode of Where My Moms At to break down the definition of trauma, and discuss surviving the holidays during COVID, alternatives to eating for comfort, accessing repressed memories, and more. They revisit a listener's email, from a few episodes prior, regarding becoming a single mom, and react to viewer advice about the situation.

In the midst of all these crazy times, we need to check in with our resident millennial comedian Chase O'Donnell to see what the kids are up to! What are they drinking? What are they watching? What are they listening to? Christina P gets all the info moms and dads need to stay hip and cool during these trying times! Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 73 Dangerous Playgrounds - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample - Go to SkylightFrame.com and use code CHRISTINA to get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame - Go to Talkspace.com or download the Talkspace app and use promo code WMMA for $100 off your first month - Receive a free 80mL diffuser when you subscribe at SimplyEarth.com/wmma

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina starts off this episode of WMMA by watching a TikTok of a mom being asked non-stop questions by her toddler while eating her lunch. She watches another in which two young girls sing a song teaching an important life lesson: "Don't be polite to men that creep you out." CP discusses James Bond movies and the female equivalent: Sex and the City. She responds to listener-submitted Michelin "Driving with Kids" stories, and watches another TikTok regarding care task morality. The Main Mommy talks dangerous playgrounds with Nadav, and responds to follow-up emails about teens wanting to cuddle, ratting out siblings and Sunday morning mouth kisses.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

LeeAnn Kreischer is the host of the "Wife of the Party" podcast, wife of Bert Kreischer, and a varsity mom. She joins Christina P on WMMA once again to discuss the book "Sex Tips for Straight Women from a Gay Man." LeeAnn covers many topics from the book, explains what it's like raising two teenagers during quarantine, and discusses the idea of toxic masculinity. CP and her react to listener submitted Michelin "Driving with Kids" stories about repeating bad words and not wearing seatbelts.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 71 Gross Boy Stuff - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com - Go to magicspoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get free shipping. - Go to AdamAndEve.com and use code WMMA to get 50% off plus 10 free gifts! - Go to KushyDreams.com and enter code WMMA for 20% off your next order - Want to try Kin Euphorics for yourself? Just go to kineuphorics.com/ChristinaP to get 15% off for the next 30 days. - Go to Apostrophe.com and get fifteen dollars off your first visit when you use code WMMAWHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P starts this episode of WMMA off by discussing child toilet locks, which she has since installed after the previous episode. The main mommy then takes a look at a TikTok of some rambunctious kids at Redlands Skate Park. She discusses Sean Connery's stance on hitting women, LeeAnn Kreischer's beej manual "Sex Tips for Straight Women from a Gay Man," and reveals her five point plan for husband maintenance. She answers some "What Would Christina P Do?" questions, reacts to Michelin "Driving with Kids" stories, and discusses cigarettes with Nadav in the booth. Later in the episode Christina is joined by fellow varsity mom Stefani Schweda Jerard via Zoom to discuss gross boy stuff, sneaky teenage daughters, and using social media to spy on your kids. CP wraps up this episode with some follow-up listener emails regarding her bathroom coffee station, ranch, as well as some #MomHacks.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's just the main mommy for this episode. She starts off by discussing how the college experience now differs from when she was in school. CP reviews viewer submitted Halloween decorations, talks about turn offs for men and women, reacts to listener cartoon crushes, and follows up on LeeAnn Kreischer beej manual. She also covers some #MomHacks, #MomFails and #NeverThoughtIdSay submissions. She wraps up with a #PazsitzkyEffect regarding cheese, prompting a conversation about favorite cheeses.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Sarah Tiana is a comedian, writer, and host of the This Week in the '90s podcast. Her and Christina discuss non-PC movies, how she met her boyfriend, performing in warzones, Cracker Barrel, Halloween festivities, and more! CP also reviews listener submitted Halloween decorations, cartoon crushes, and Michelin "Driving With Kids" stories.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's just the main mommy for this episode. She starts out by discussing her Halloween decorations for this year, then segues into discussing the classic Disney film "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs." This brings us back to the topic of "Cartoon Crushes," and Christina responds to listener-submittted crushes. CP reads a spider #MomFail, and shares one of her own: a toddler Advil mishap. She covers some Michelin "Driving with Kids" stories, as well as a batch of Pazsitzky Effects. She wraps up with some "Never Thought I'd Say" emails and WWCPD questions.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P is joined by Susan Pinsky in this episode of Where My Moms At? item.title: Ep. 64 Two Dads w/Riaz Patel - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com. - Go to KushyDreams.com and enter code WMMA for 20% off - Go to magicspoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get free shipping. - Register your child at LaurelSprings.com/wmma today and receive a waived registration fee. - Head to Ancestry.com/WMMA to get your AncestryHealth kit today! - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample - Get 20% off your first order and free shipping in the US when you head over to NoDaysWasted.CO/WMMA and use promo code “WMMA” at checkout.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Riaz Patel is a reality television producer and father of two. He joins Christina P for this episode of WMMA to discuss being a gay dad, growing up in rural West Virginia as a Pakistani immigrant, what it's like going through airport security for him, mom judgement, differences between straight and gay couples, raising kids to have manners, and more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.description:
SPONSORS: -Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com. -Go to AdamAndEve.com and use code WMMA to get 50% off plus 10 free gifts! - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample - Go to PlushCare.com/wmma to start your FREE 30-day trial - Get 20% off your first order when you use promo code MOM at TryCaliper.com/Mom

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Chrirstina P discusses her kids going back to school, switching from drinking tequila to wine, animated childhood crushes, Aaron Carter's cool video, gender reveal parties, Paris Hilton's trauma, and more in this episode of WMMA. She responds to listener questions about why we don't eat people, a mother-in-law who is dating a murderer, feeling guilty about not wanting to play with kids, potty training with bidets, and if age is a qualifier for raising kids. She also reads some viewer-submitted #MomHacks and #PazsitzkyEffects.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 62 Coping w/ Kati Morton - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: -Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com. -Go to magicspoon.com/WMMA and use code WMMA at checkout to get free shipping. -Go to AdamAndEve.com and use code WMMA to get 50% off plus 10 free gifts! -Get 15% off your order at BuyRaycon.com/WMMA! - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Kati Morton is a Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist, and the host of the Opinions That Don't Matter podcast. She joins Christina P in this episode to discuss her upcoming projects, favorite kids shows, the LA Zoo, the most important things in a relationship, and how she's coped during quarantine. Kati and CP follow-up on couple's shower antics, and #DogMom hacks. They respond to listener-submitted questions regarding getting over being cheated on, coping with guilt about your parents, family systems, knowing when your boundaries have been crossed, getting through to kids, feeling pressure to have a baby, and managing a husband that lacks common sense. Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.description:
SPONSORS: - Register your child at LaurelSprings.com/wmma today and receive a waived registration fee. - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TryMe and order a free sample - Go to kineuphorics.com and use discount code CHRISTINAP at checkout to get 15% off for the next 30 days - Head over to NoDaysWasted.CO/WMMA and use promo code "WMMA” at checkout for 20% off your first order - To get 20% off your purchase of $75 or more INCLUDING sale items, go to ModCloth.com and enter code WMMA at checkout.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P starts this episode of Where My Moms At by discussing the most recent art her son's did on her wall. She transitions to talking about Trader Joe's controversy over their ethnic brand names, endorses her favorite steam cleaner, and insists that moms should "lean in and whisper" instead of yelling at their children. She calls Dr. Drew to discuss Paris Hilton's new documentary, and covers Jason Vukovich, who was charged with beating chomos with a hammer. She then calls Tom Segura to talk about his new ball-drying technique. CP also shares a photo of her as a goth teenager, and discusses the gross drinks she used to order. She wraps up by responding to viewer-submitted Things I Never Thought I'd Say and Pazsitzky Effects.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 59 Mind-Body Connection w/ LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to magicspoon.com/WMMA to grab a variety pack and try it today! And be sure to use our promo code WMMA at checkout to get free shipping. - Go to Ancestry.com/WMMA to get your AncestryDNA kit and start your free trial - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample - Get 15% off your order at BuyRaycon.com/wmma! - Go to kineuphorics.com and use discount code CHRISTINAP at checkout to get 15% off for the next 30 days. - Go to PlushCare.com/wmma to start your FREE 30-day trial - Get 20% off your order and free shipping in the US over at NoDaysWasted.CO/WMMA and use promo code "WMMA” at checkout

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

LeeAnn Kreischer is the host of the Wife of the Party podcast, and is married to Bert Kreischer. She joins Christina P for this episode of Where My Moms At? They discuss Christina's new plant-based diet, the passing of LeeAnn's dog, Tom Segura's vasectomy, and transcendental meditation. They respond to listener-submitted Pazsitzky Effects regarding peeling open boxes, changing channels, mismatched socks, pasta sauce, cereal, and more! They listen to viewer voicemails about the longest someone's gone without a shower and parents opening a credit card in their kid's name. They also take a look at the listener submissions for "Thing You Thought You'd Never Say." They wrap up the episode with a conversation about the mind, body, spirit connection.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 58 Don't Trust Your Feelings - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to AdamandEve.com and use offer code WMMA to get 50% off just about any item plus 10 FREE Gifts! Use code WMMA at checkout! - Get 20% off your first order when you use promo code MOM at TryCaliper.com/Mom - Go to FractureMe.com/WMMA and enter promo code WMMA, to save 20% off your Fracture glass print. - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TryMe and order a free sample - Go to kineuphorics.com and use discount code CHRISTINAP at checkout to get 15% off for the next 30 days

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P starts this episode of Where My Moms At by discussing how men are crybabies when it comes to handling pain. She then watches a TikTok of a guy ridiculing peanut allergies. She also discusses her recent Pazsitzky Effects regarding sharpening knives and buying soap, and responds to listener-submitted Pazsitzky Effects. CP then looks at emails from the mommy listeners containing #MomHacks and some gross habit follow ups. She watches another TikTok of a foreign pool kiss, and discusses menstrual cups, boys roughhousing, pet reptiles, and why she gets hotel rooms with two beds.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 57 Navigating Motherhood w/ Jamie-Lynn Sigler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to AdamandEve.com and use that offer code WMMA at checkout to get 50% off just about any item plus 10 FREE Gifts! - Ancestry.com/WMMA to get your AncestryDNA kit and start your free trial. - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample - Upload your photo at FractureMe.com/WMMA to print your photo on glass today - You can get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go SkylightFrame.com and enter code "CHRISTINA" - Go to kineuphorics.com and use discount code CHRISTINAP at checkout to get 15% off for the next 30 days

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Jamie Lynn-Sigler is an actress, best known for her role on The Sopranos, and the host of the Pajama Pants podcast. She joins Christina P for this episode of the Momcast. Jamie-Lynn and Christina discuss Jamie's parents, navigating motherhood, having sex on Ambien, the best kid snacks, and Jamie-Lynn's father-in-law, Lenny Dykstra. They call Christina's pediatrician, Dr. Hochman, for an update on Coronavirus, and whether or not parents should send their children to school. The two varsity moms also respond to viewer voicemails and emails regarding their Pazsitzky Effects, hairs in b-holes, and some What Would Christina P Do? submissions.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 56 The Pazsitzky Effect - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to ThriveMarket.com/WMMA to start your risk-free membership and get up to twenty dollars toward your first order. - Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code WMMA, only at Brooklinen.com - Save 25% off your first order and go to DrinkHydrant.com/WMMA or enter promo code "WMMA" at checkout. - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina starts off this episode of WMMA by reflecting on working at her dad's forklift business when she was 14. She checks in with the guys in the booth to see what their summers were like at 14. She then calls Dr. Drew to ask him whether or not kids should go back to school amidst the COVID-19 pandemic. CP also discusses The Shahs of Sunset, Demi Moore's new podcast, Kreayshawn, Tekashi 6ix9ine, and what Sopranos actor Rob Iler has coined as "The Pazsitzky Effect." She then responds to listener voicemails and emails about gross habits their partners have, as well as follow-ups about Crocs, blow dryers, and b-hole hairs. She then goes on to do a round of #MomHacks and takes some What Would Christina P Do? questions.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 55 Accepting Your Partner w/ LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
SPONSORS: - Go to ThriveMarket.com/WMMA to join today and you’ll get up to twenty dollars in shopping credit toward your first order - Register your child at LaurelSprings.com/wmma today and receive a waived registration fee - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/tryme and order a free sample

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

LeeAnn Kreischer is the host of the Wife of the Party podcast, and is married to Bert Kreischer. She joins Christina P for this episode of Where My Moms At? They discuss Bert's daily Kool-Aid consumption, snoring, pool showers, barehanded wiping, and other gross habits. They also talk about their mom schedules during quarantine, buying expensive things, surfing, working out, and of course Birkenstocks. They respond to emails from this listeners regarding b-hole hairs, and gross bachelor habits. They also look at some viewer-submitted #MomHacks!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 54 Girl Dad w/ Tom Papa - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Tom Papa is a stand-up comedian, actor, author, radio host, and the host of the Breaking Bread podcast. He joins Christina P for this episode of the Momcast. The two varsity parents discuss their quarantine mindsets, the differences between boys and girls, Dirty Dancing, Birkenstocks, and the importance of marital loves. They also share their pet peeves that they have about their spouses.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 53 Barefoot Society - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P starts with reflecting on how incredible Susan Pinsky was as a guest. So much insight! Then we learn about Nadav's new discovery about fabric softener and how incredibly normal and responsible Chris is. Christina shows some photographic evidence of barefoot/croc nightmares. We check in on a HUGE line to get into the Birkenstock store. WHY. Christina shares some on-topic TikToks about mom hacks, models, and cool skater boys. We hear some follow up emails from alive humans who were left alone with strangers, dad hacks, and a whole bunch of questions for "What Would Christina P Do?!"

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 51 Where My Dads At? - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina just had her 44th birthday and she got RIPPED. Christina goes into a bit what it was like doing standup back then. Christina teaches Nadav about basic bedding and hygiene practices and they go back and forth on figuring out what a husband wants vs what a wife wants. Hint: one is universally much easier to figure out than the other. Then we get into some absolutely genius mom hacks, some terrible mom fails, AND we ask "Where My Dads At?!" We hear from the dad listeners about what their spouse does to annoy them the most.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 50 Ask A Pediatrician w/ Dr. Jessica Hochman - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Christina P is joined by pediatrician Dr. Jessica Hochman in this episode of Where My Moms At? They discuss wigs, having a doctor as a husband, dads who change diapers, as well as follow-ups on Birkenstocks and cloth diapers. They take calls from listeners about sugar in a kid's diet, anxiety getting off of ADHD medication, kids banging their heads, baby-led weaning, and kids drinking urine. They also respond to e-mails regarding limiting screen time, circumcision, excessive crying, and more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

item.title: Ep. 48 Wake Up Calls w/ LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

LeeAnn Kreischer joins Christina P. for this episode of Where My Moms At? The two of them discuss quarantine purchases, mom footwear, and destructive boys. Christina shares videos of a person who identifies as non-binary trans masc and Kat Von D's baby. The two varsity moms also share their techniques for waking up their kids. They wrap up by responding to some listener voicemails/e-mails regarding worms in sushi, being hesitant to have children, and having kids two years apart.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 47 Straight Outta Budapest w/ Dr. Drew - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Dr. Drew joins Christina P. for this episode of Where My Moms At? The two of them discuss underwear suggestions, hyphenated last names, and the Eastern Blocker mentality. They then take calls from listeners regarding having a child at a late age, jelqing, and an obsession with. Drew and Mommy Tina also look at some viewer-submitted #MomFails about "Mommy's Medicine" and a child playing with bras.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 46 New Wig Who Dis - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this episode of "Where My Moms At?" Christina P. discusses the Kardashians, tips for buying wigs, singing to her son, and Ryan Gosling. She goes over some #MomHacks involving water balloons and play forts before getting into some "What Would Christina P. Do? listener questions. Topics include birthday voicemails, watching cam girls, and getting your spouse to manipulate you.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this episode of Where My Moms At? Christina P. takes live calls from the Mommy listeners. Christina and YMH producer Nadav Itzkowitz answer questions about being annoyed with your kids, dealing with postpartum depression, and handling immigrant in-laws. A caller also shares a fun grandma fail! How are YOU spending YOUR Mother's Day? Let us know in the comment section below!

item.title: Ep. 43 Mommy Matchmaker - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On this episode of Where My Moms At? Christina P. discusses possible candidates to be YMH producer Nadav Itzkowitz's wife. Nadav and Mommy Tina discuss red flags and dealbreakers in a new relationship. Christina then looks at some viewer-submitted #MomFails including a cake made by a child and a toenail mishap. She then takes questioners from the listeners about meeting fans, spanking, and breastfeeding during quarantine. Who do YOU think is the best potential suiter for Nadav? Let us know in the comment section below!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Tom Segura, Christina P's husband, sits down with Christina for this episode of Where My Moms At? Christina asks Tom many questions that she never has before. They discuss their relationship, their sex life, their family, and their goals. What's something that YOU'VE always wanted to ask your partner but never have? Let us know in the comment section below!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 40 Endless Spring Break w/ LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

LeeAnn Kreischer joins Christina P. for this episode of Where My Moms At? LeeAnn discusses how her and husband Bert Kreischer are dealing with the Coronavirus quarantine. Christina shares what it's like being home with two young kids, and discusses a vintage Sesame Street activity book that she has been referencing. LeeAnn and Christina also trade husband management tips for the quarantine. The two of them take listener questions about having a second kid, dating a goth girl, and a 10-year old exhibitionist. The moms then discuss what they're watching during the quarantine. Their favorites include "Ozark," "Tiger King," and "Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory." What are YOU watching during the quarantine? Let us know in the comment section below!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 39 Dad Questions w/ Dr. Drew - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Dr. Drew sits down with Christina P. for this episode of Where My Moms At? They discuss the current Coronavirus situation and how it's unfolding in California. Remember to always listen to what Dr. Fauci recommends before anyone else! Drew and Christina discuss their quarantine schedules, and answer Coronavirus questions from the listeners. They also take questions about a kid making himself vomit, anger issues, and being called daddy in the bedroom. The two also discuss the hit Netflix documentary Tiger King.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 38 - Quaranting w/ Katia Morton via Skype - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

We're all quarantined up! It's crazy times in the world and we're doing our best to cope! Christina shares what she's been doing to calm herself down and even skypes with Kati Morton to see how a mental health professional is dealing with it all! We share mom hacks, mom fails, and follow up on all your submissions!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 37 - Live Calls With Mommmies - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

We have LIVE calls on today's episode and we are talking to moms and dads in real time! Christina P is joined by Nadav today for some help with the tech and we field all sorts of fun stuff! What are your browns like after having a baby? How cool was your dad growing up? Mom hacks involving red lights and movies in Spanish and so much more! Follow Christina on instagram so you can be one of the first to know when lines open up!

item.title: Ep. 36 - Who's The MOST Messed Up? - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today’s episode, Christina P. discusses group therapy, mouth kissing family members, and changing sheets. She answers some listener emails about hour-long browns, cutting kids' hair, and being an overprotective mom. She listens to #MomHacks regarding sprinkles on medicine, travel-sized shampoo, and oat cereal. Christina also looks at a #MomFail about a cool mom's "feelings" and a video of a cool gal with lots of makeup. CP then poses the question "Who is the most messed up YMH staffer?" Let us know what YOU think in the comment section below!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 33 - Progressive Hooters - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today’s episode, Christina P. explores some FATHERLY advice she and the crew got when they were children. How would you redesign the Hooters uniform by the way?? Plus we have some dad E-Mails and VMs that sound braggadocios. Plus there are plenty of “Mom Hacks” to get you through life.

item.title: Ep. 32 - The Snapback - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Today, Christina P. discusses “The Snapback” by making you feel better about yourself no matter where your progress might be. See: Thousand Pound Sisters. Also, Madonna and her boyfriend have a bit of an age difference, what are your thoughts? Christina’s tissue habits are readdressed, plus more Mom Fails, WWCPD, and your voicemails/emails!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 31 - Love Language w/ Kati Morton - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Kati Morton, a licensed therapist and youtuber, returns to the desk with Christina P. to tackle some of your hard hitting questions. Like talking to your kids about serious adult issues, not passing on phobias and family dynamics. She also has a wild revelation about our recent “quarterly” rule.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 29 - Spreading Ashes In Disneyland - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina wants to discuss the gross things we do when we’re alone. Plus, she follows up on some past topics, including latchkey kid food, while going through your emails. Then, Christina and Blueban get into a heated debate about what happens more on Disneyland rides: romantic stuff OR spreading loved ones' ashes? What do YOU think? Christina also uncovers a bunch of new Mom Hacks about food, laundry, and getting your kids to be more self-reliant!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 28 - Latchkey Lunches - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina reads an email from a listener on the division of duties in the household, and Christina's never read anything so beautiful. Do you think she can get Tom to do laundry for Valentine's day? We then look into some current events involving IKEA's recent pay-out settlement to a family that bought a faulty dresser, as well as some backlash by parents on LOL Dolls! We then go DEEP on what some listeners ate as children growing up. Did you make an latchkey kid meals? Share your recipes with us!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 27 - Dad School - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina P watches a heartwarming video of dads doing their daughter's hair. Christina also shares a story from her wedding rehearsal and looks at a viewer video about quarterly milking. Christina then goes over some #MomFails involving accidentally setting a child's hair on fire, a mom who thinks her child is a TikTok and a milk mess in a car. She then moves onto some great #MomHacks about doing laundry and especially big browns.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

It's a Very Merry Christmas episode of WMMA today as Christina P is super in the holiday spirit. How has Christmas changed for Christina P between her childhood and Motherhood? Movies, Carols, and Decorations are covered as well as how to handle Mall Santas. Plus, messages from all the Cool Mom listeners including Mom Hacks, What Would CP do and Mom Fails!

item.title: Ep. 22 - Holiday Mom Tips - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

We have a special holiday treat for all you mommies and mothers today! Christina's cousin-in-law, Iris, joins us and we got all the cool mom tips for having a successful holiday season! Is there a better way to wrap presents? How can you handle making an entire holiday meal by yourself? when family comes to visit, do you let them stay with you? Is time management even possible? All this and more (about quarterly beej's) on this episode of Where My Mom's At?!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 21 - Netflix & Weirding Out - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today’s episode, Christina P talks about Ryan Gosling, Gelson's Salad Bar, and menopause. She also discusses her Netflix viewing habits while her husband (Tom Segura) is out of town, and pushing out browns. She then takes listener questions about in vitro fertilization (IVF), transitioning a baby to a crib, and having a second child. Christina then goes over some #MomFails that have been sent in by the mommy listeners, including stories about a child accidentally doing a back flip and a mom's bathing suit mishap. She then moves on to some great #MomHacks for getting ink out of clothes and keeping a child entertained on a long flight.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 20 - White Claws &. Milking Your Spouse - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today’s episode, Christina P talks about White Claw, period belts, and milking habits. She also shares some new Cool Mom lingo she learned, and tells the story of how she learned to drink. She then takes listener questions about kids getting sick, a husband talking to his ex-wife, and a couple with mismatched libido. item.title: Ep. 19 - Being A Mom Is HARD - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina starts with bringing up how raising a baby is hard for EVERYONE... Even the royal Meghan Markle! She shares her story about going to Target, analyzes Billie Eilish's song "Bad Guy," and goes deep on what she was like in her Goth phase. Christina then asks the guys in the booth about their dumb phases growing up and what some of their current habits consist of. We then take questions from the mommy listeners about miscarriages, what you owe your mom for taking care of you, the loving assist, PLUS a bunch of #MomFails !

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

On today's episode, Christina starts with bringing up how raising a baby is hard for EVERYONE... Even the royal Meghan Markle! She shares her story about going to Target, analyzes Billie Eilish's song "Bad Guy," and goes deep on what she was like in her Goth phase. Christina then asks the guys in the booth about their dumb phases growing up and what some of their current habits consist of. We then take questions from the mommy listeners about miscarriages, what you owe your mom for taking care of you, the loving assist, PLUS a bunch of #MomFails !

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 18 - Cool Dad Ryan Sickler - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, we have Studio Jeans' own single dad Ryan Sickler joining Christina for Where My Moms At! We go over kids getting sick (and a mom hack on WHERE to clean those mishaps), dating a parent, and everything in between. Sickler has a young daughter, to Christina runs him through scenarios to see if he's prepared to reach his #CoolMom potential.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 17 - Cool Mom Tips w/ Chase O'Donnell - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, everyone knows Christina P. is not like a regular mom... she's a COOL mom! But do you think that comes easy? Or by accident? Absolutely not! Christina invites super cool millennial/comedian Chase O'Donnell to give a Keynote presentation on what exactly the cool kids are into today. Are you watching the cool TV shows? Are you listening to the cool music? Are you using the cool social media platforms? After all, this show isn't just about helping to make parenthood easier, but also to make sure you stay as cool as possible in the process!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 04 - So Over October w/ LeeAnn Kreischer & Christina P
item.description: October is finally almost over! LeeAnn Kreischer and Christina P. wrap up this year's Sober October by reflecting on how this year has gone. Tom took a flight lesson Christina isn't too happy about, however, he still maintains his double-title as Sleep AND Recovery Champ! Bert continues his spin classes and not sleeping. Will he make it to 205lbs by the end of the month? Probably not. We also get an update from LeeAnn on firing the her housekeeper!
item.author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)

item.title: Ep. 16 - 2 Sets of Twins - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Christina P. has on a 5-Star General Mom. Nakeya comes on to discuss have TWO sets of twins months apart and how she held it all down. Christina asks Nakeya about the annoyance she faced from other moms and how she held down a home and marriage with so many new bodies in the family. Plus more Mom Hacks, including Nakeya's, and more of your Mom Fail video and voice messages!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 03 - So Over October w/ LeeAnn Kreischer & Christina P
item.description:
Every October, Joe Rogan, Ari Shaffir, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer embark on an odyssey known as "Sober October." The effects have been felt far and wide among fans and listeners, but how does it effect those who are there to see them day in and day out? This podcast, hosted by Christina P. and LeeAnn Kreischer is a glimpse into how The "Sober October" journey directly effects the lives of the men's spouses and families.

On Episode 3 the wine is being poured once again and Christina mentions she did CBD AND wine the night before. Leeann and Christina feel bad that they've been talking so much smack that they've given their husbands permission to do the same on 2 Bears 1 Cave. Plus we get an update on the recent classes the wives have seen their husbands take, an update on the WHOOP stats and new homework assignments for next week.
item.author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)

item.title: Ep. 02 - So Over October w/ LeeAnn Kreischer & Christina P
item.description: Every October, Joe Rogan, Ari Shaffir, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer embark on an odyssey known as "Sober October." The effects have been felt far and wide among fans and listeners, but how does it effect those who are there to see them day in and day out? This podcast, hosted by Christina P. and LeeAnn Kreischer is a glimpse into how The "Sober October" journey directly effects the lives of the men's spouses and families. On Episode 2 the Wives have brought wine. We start off this weeks recap by taking a look at the guys WHOOP statistics. We know Tom has been to the gun range, but now Bert has gone and he's taken LeeAnn with him. Christina and LeeAnn also discuss some of the books that Tom and Bert are reading, the worst cleaning lady ever and even a short phone call with Dr. Drew.

item.title: Ep. 01 - So Over October w/ LeeAnn Kreischer & Christina P
item.description: Every October, Joe Rogan, Ari Shaffir, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer embark on an odyssey known as "Sober October." The effects have been felt far and wide among fans and listeners, but how does it affect those who are there to see them day in and day out? This podcast, hosted by Christina P. and LeeAnn Kreischer is a glimpse into how The #SoberOctober journey directly affects the lives of the men's spouses and families. On Episode 1 of this mini-series Christina and LeeAnn discuss the past years and how much they dread the month of October. They get into what it's been like leading up to 2019's "Sober October" and how they've better mentally prepared. Plus, in the lead up, Ari dosed Bert for an episode of "The Bertcast" so we hear LeeAnn's reaction in full.
item.author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)

item.title: Ep. 15 Greg Fitzsimmons - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, standup comedian, podcaster AND dad... Greg Fitzsimmons joins us! Greg and CP go over what a married love life looks like, praising your kids too much, mental health and a lot more! We also go over some of your mom fails and your super useful mom hacks!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

Greg and CP go over what a married love life looks like, praising your kids too much, mental health and a lot more! We also go over some of your mom fails and your super useful mom hacks! Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 14 CP Takes Your Calls - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Today Christina runs us through her favorite mom of the week. Is there a better way to celebrate a one-year-old's birthday? We then have some huge follow-up emails, one of which is from the dad with the pretty-serious Mom Fail of having parental activities occur in the same room as their five-year-old! Closure! We got some great mom hacks for you revolving around your baby's sleep, and some cheap fun with a hose!

Christina then takes your questions on raising your child as a young mom versus as an old mom, public changing table concerns, being a stay-at-home mom, and how to deal with nosey friends!

If you have a mom fail, mom hack, or have a question you want CP to answer on the show, leave us a concise voicemail at (213) 375-5184 OR you can send us emails/videos at WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com!

item.title: Ep. 13 Hila Klein - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, Hila Klein, one half of the H3 podcast, founder of the clothing line "Teddy Fresh" and brand new mom joins the show. She has just emerged from the "Dark Forest" in terms of Mom-dom, reaching the 4 month stage. Hila discusses her disdain for Breast-feeding and how it plays into her "Mom Guilt." She also discusses the process she went through to become an American citizen and Christina shares many, many "Mom Fails" with Hila to make her feel better about her impending ones.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 12 LeeAnn Kreischer - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On today's episode, LeeAnn Kreischer (Varsity Mom and Host of the "Wife Of The Party" podcast) returns to the show to give Christina more insight into having teenagers. Discussions about sex talks, bra shopping and periods are had as LeeAnn has been in the throws of these issues with her two girls. The two review some Mom Fails and also discuss there "wife-ly duties" to their husbands.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 11 CP Takes Your Calls - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description: This week on Where My Moms At w/ Christina P we go over some nightmare mom fails, some dream-like mom hacks, and everything in between! CP shares some more about growing up with her dad during childhood and tries to analyze a holiday Christmas card she posed for as a kid. We take a bunch of your mom questions about how to know if you want kids, what do about explaining Santa isn't real, and worries about raising your kids in the future. You got mom questions, and CP's got mom answers! Send us your mom fails, mom hacks, or short questions you want to ask CP advice on by emails us at WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com or leaving us a voicemail at (213) 275-5184

item.title: Ep.10 Alison Rosen - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
This week, your new best friend (and new mom) Alison Rosen joins Christina P in Studio Jeans for this week's Where My Moms At! They go over traumatic births, reclaiming your libido, trusting your husbands with your kids, and so much more! We got mom fails, mom hacks, and some opinions on traveling with kids!

And of course, we love hearing from you, the listeners, more than anything! Send us your mom stories (fails, hacks, questions) via email or voicemail!

WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com

(213)375-5184

item.title: Ep. 09 CP Takes Your Calls - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On Episode 9, The Main Mommy, Christina P, has a few guests via phone. First, it's Lauren who is having a hard time getting the adequate care for her child when she has to leave hers with her family. Then, Christina gets Steven on the phone who heads up the Alexis Joy Foundation which was created to honor his wife who took her own life after suffering from postpartum depression. Plus more of your Mom Fails, voice messages and "What would CP do!"

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 08 Kati Morton - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On Episode 8 Christina welcomes Kati Morton, a licensed marriage and family therapist, not to mention YouTube star!! Kati tells Christina all about her history on YouTube and how some therapists are also in therapy. The two cover some frequently asked therapy questions, the difference between anxiety and depression and do some role plays in order to find out how to balance kids and husbands.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.

item.title: Ep. 07 A Rural Mom Spills the Tea - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
item.description:
WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

On Episode 7, Christina dives deep into your E-Mails and voice messages as she is going solo in the Mommy Dome. She updates us on the latest cool mom trends including TikTok and a BIG week she had. We have a plentiful amount of "Mom Fails" to cover including some of Christina's, too. Plus, Christina brings on a mom from a rural part of the country named Sara. She enlightens Christina on some of the differences they may experience living in different parts of the country, both geographically and culturally.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
